'''"Even-Handed Judgment"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Even-Handed Judgment is obtainable by buying the Gnostic Chorus package of the [[Battle Pass/Primal Fire|Primal Fire Battle Pass]].
